Package ca.nl.cna.sheham.assignments.Fall2023.Assignment5

Class Invoice

java.lang.Object
ca.nl.cna.sheham.assignments.Fall2023.Assignment5.Invoice
public class Invoice extends Object
A class for an invoice that contains 3 instances of an invoice item.

  • Constructor Summary
